channel.title: Random Crashing?
channel.description: I have a server thats Insidiax [pi] running on Vernixpkz cache, and every now and then it randomly crashes for everyone. Every hour or 2 it happens, and it happens multiple times that time. I don't know why this is happening. I have paypal if needed.

item.title: Random Crashing?
item.dc:creator: @yvesdv yvesdv
item.description:
@yvesdv wrote:

InsidiaX stability is crap, I had my server running on it but I’ve put an auto restarter into it.
The crashes you have happening are memleaks and deadlocks which are really hard to fix.

Read full topic
